price: 54.Nabii Mucammadow ku-marah cusey:Nabii Luut isi marak qaxumaane kak gufti toofee taama abtan isin umam teetik abaluk iyye waqdi.
arabic: وَلُوطًا إِذۡ قَالَ لِقَوۡمِهِۦٓ أَتَأۡتُونَ ٱلۡفَٰحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمۡ تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walūṭan idh qāla liqawmihi atatūna al-fāḥishata wa-antum tub'ṣirūna
